event.descr:
The major Service Identifier is different than the expected value. If the tspTSEncodingStandard for this transport stream is dvb(3) or isdb(5), the major Service Identifier value is always equal to the program_number. Since expected and received services are matched based on the value of the program_number in the corresponding program_map_section (PMT), a mismatch cannot be reported as a tspEventOCVServiceIDError. Instead, both a tspEventOCVServiceMissingError and tspEventOCVUnexpectedServiceError will be reported.
